title: Evolution and the origin of life
brief_description: Uses cinemicroscopy, time-lapse photography, special effects, animation, macro-photography, and documentary and nature footage to survey the history of the earth from its beginning. Topics represented include DNA, bacteria photosynthesis, flagellates, sexual reproduction, multicellular colonies, the Miller-Urey ‘hot soup’ experiment, and Darwin’s theories.
